import React from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useState} from 'react' import logi from '../logi.png' import '../App.css' const Nava = ({movie,fav}) => { const [sug, setSug] = useState([]) const chage = (e) => { if (e.target.value === ''){ setSug('') }else{ setSug( e.target.value );} }; return (
Acceuil {fav}
{movie.filter((x) => x.includes() == sug).map((el) => (

{el.title}

))}
); } export default Nava
